data.title: Sivaji Ganesan's Son, Karate Thiagarajan Join BJP
data.meta_description: Read this exciting story from The New Indian Express Chennai February 12, 2021. The late actor Sivaji Ganesan’s son Ramkumar and his son Dushyant joined the BJP at the party headquarters on Thursday.
data.text:

CM To Modi: Run Govt Impartially Or Get Isolated

A day after criticising the union government for ignoring Tamil Nadu and several other states in the Union Budget, Chief Minister MK Stalin on Wednesday said, "Honourable Prime Minister, you said since the elections are over, all have to think about the country now.

As city prepares to ring in the new, Parisiens haven't forgotten old

'Duty cut to boost domestic phone manufacturing

THE reduction in basic Customs duty on smartphone parts will not immediately lower smartphone prices, but it is expected to boost domestic manufacturing in the country.

RBI makes KYC stringent for domestic transactions

THE Reserve Bank has revised the extant regulatory framework guiding domestic money transfer services by making the know your customer (KYC) record requirements stringent after a review of the current framework guiding various payments and money transfer services.

Indexation removal from realty sales to have mixed impact

THE removal of indexation benefits from property sales is expected to have a mixed impact with investors likely to pay more in taxes if property prices are appraised at a tepid pace.

The New Indian Express

Duty hike on equipment to raise telecom services cost

THE increase in basic Customs duty from 10% to 15% on certain specified telecom equipment will make services for telecom service providers (TSPs) costlier, says the Cellular Operator Association of India (COAI) on Wednesday.

The New Indian Express

Kamala rips Trump in punchy address at rally in battleground Wisconsin

AN exuberant Kamala Harris whipped up a rapturous crowd on Tuesday at her first rally since effectively clinching the Democratic presidential nomination, as she launched fresh attacks on ex President Donald Trump for trying to \"take the country backward.\"
